user@localhost:~/test$ singularity prep start-daggen 1 name
ID  Type    State  ErrorMessage  WorkerID  
1   daggen  ready                <nil>     

user@localhost:~/test$ singularity --verbose prep start-daggen 1 name
ID  Type    State  ErrorMessage  ErrorStackTrace  WorkerID  AttachmentID  
1   daggen  ready                                 <nil>     1
